title: Someone else dodged, but I got penalty? But it still didn't give me a loss in my promos?
body:
Am I going insane? It was declare champion phase, and was discussing swapping with someone and then a dodge happened and I get a penalty :D 

I got scared I would get kicked from promo but Im still in.

replies.body: The same thing happened to me in my promos to plat. I was second bam and the ban was on the first person of my team. Someone dodged as soon as a champ got banned and my client did some glitchy thing and I got a penalty. This included a loss on my promos record.

I looked into this, and it looks like you did have a queue dodge which brought you down to 78 LP.   A [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) did count as a loss towards a series, and your second.  Your client may not have been updated yet, but this should end your series.  I know I'm not exactly providing good news here, but I wish you luck in your next attempt!
